metadata.Title: CVE-2016-5835 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: WordPress before 4.5.3 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitiverevision-history information by leveraging the ability to read a post,related to wp-admin/includes/ajax-actions.php and wp-admin/revision.php.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
